channel.title: Offline messaging? Password encryption? Passcode clan chats?
channel.description:
Hi guys, thanks for looking first of all.
Okay I was wondering if there is a way to bring offline messaging, so if I was to PM a user it would hold all messages until they get online. It sounds to me like a heavy background coding, and I'm still learning how java works (I can do PHP and some C++) so I'm not a complete noob I'll be programming this myself soon.
I think my server is pi running version 317.
Also is there a way to encrypt the user passwords with MD5 or at least Base64? And is there a way to code-protect clans? I was thinking about making an admin only clan chat.
Thanks loads, Ste. xWeedscape
